How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to start?
yes
great! i'm at the starting point next to a twig
ahora a donde?
you need to move to ther parrot and go around it to the right in a circular motion
cool. i skirted around the parrot to the right
now i'm close to an elephant. what next?
continue around the elephant and head to teh frogt
alright, went around the elephant
Puedo ver la rana ahora. ¿Adónde voy ahora?
go to the frog
ok, i'm at the frog now
turn around and walk on the alligator's back, past the elephant, and towards the giraffe
done, just passed that big old elephant again
now i see the giraffe. ¿y ahora qué?
walk in front of the giraffe and head to the snake
passed the giraffe, now at the snake
¿qué sigue?
keep walking forrward and you will see the chest
yup, there's the chest! thanks, that was fun! *finished*

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Yes let's play.  Please speak english
sure thing! see that wooden bench to your left? head towards it and cross that trail
you'll see the florist stand, but don't go to it. instead, make a left u-turn and go back towards the white dog
i am at the white dog
great! now cross over that branch and head south
Continúe hasta que vea otro perro blanco junto a una manta de picnic de aspecto llamativo.
i am heading south to the picnic basket
nice! now, step over the mat, brush past a bowl of berries then head west
i am past the bowl
perfect! now, there's a branch ahead of you
Úsalo para cruzar el río hacia el norte.
i am heading north via the branch
awesome! see that green bush? don't touch it, but circle it from the right until you reach the florist stand
i am at the florist
superb! now, turn left, go underneath the stand and head towards a big ol' bridge
Verás algunas personas en bicicleta. ¡Lo estás haciendo genial!
i am over the bridge
wonderful! just past the bridge there are two elderly folks on a bench
have a look!
i am at the old people
nice! from there, walk a few steps south until you're between the elderly folks and a wooden branch
Verás un arbusto verde cerca del final de la rama.
i am there
excellent! now, go east, just between the branch and the bush
i am at the deer
well done! that's the objective
has navegado con éxito el camino. esto es divertido, ¿no?
yay!
congrats, mate! you really nailed it
would you fancy another round?
yes
¡está bien! Vamos a llevarte de regreso a la parte superior derecha donde está el doggo blanco y comenzaremos de nuevo.
please speak englidsh
of course! let's head back to the top right corner where the white dog is, and we'll start over

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?

yes begin at the tent and walk south towards the dog. Do not touch the dog but go around him and towards the fire. go up and around to the left of the fire towards the mushrooms.  Walk down towards the blue car but dont touch the car.  Do a u-turn around thart bush and head south to the telescope.  Walk between the telescope and the bush in front of it. until you reach the trail.  Head east over the rocks and to the house.  That is your final destination.
got it, buddy! walking south past the dog, around the fire towards the mushroom. making my way down to the blue car, sharp u-turn around the bush then heading south towards the telescope
yendo entre el telescopio y el arbusto, siguiendo el sendero y dirigiéndose hacia el este sobre las rocas. Aquí estamos en la casa, la hicimos sana y salva. *finalizado*

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
yes
alright, buddy

simplemente camine debajo de la primera palmera en dirección suroeste, luego gire a la derecha pasando el segundo árbol. Antes de llegar al tercero, gire bruscamente a la izquierda y continúe hacia el sur.
please speak english only
my bad! head under the first palm tree southwest, make a right passing the second tree
before hitting the third one, take a sharp left and keep going south
i am going south
great! now, drift a bit left and walk past the brown puppy
luego, gira a la derecha y continúa hacia el sur.
i am past the puppy
perfect! see those rocks? navigate between the big one on the west and the small one on the east to reach the water
i am at the water
well done! now, get in the water and face that big red crab
Cuando lo veas, gira a la derecha y sigue la gran roca, continúa hacia el oeste en el agua.
I am facing the crag
cool! keep going west in the water
look out for a medium sized rock
crab
oops, celebrate too early! ignore the crab and make a sharp right when you face the shark
luego regresa a tierra
i see the rock
perfect! now head back to the land, crossing between the rock and the three-colored ball, heading north
i am going north
awesome! tilt slightly to your left and go northwest between that red tent and large speaker
i am there
¡lindo! Camine alrededor de la tienda en línea curva y luego continúe hacia el sur, hacia el mar.
english
my bad again! walk around the tent and then head south towards the sea
but when you get to the shore, turn right and walk under the red kayak
i am under the kayak
¡excelente! ahora, gira a la derecha y avanza a lo largo del kayak hasta que veas un pequeño arbusto verde.
english please
sorry buddy! turn right, walk along the kayak until you see a small green bush
you're almost there!

general_survey.answer: I am okay with it.  Ads long as I understrand
